title: If you’re feeling discouraged seeing your #linkedin feed fill up with #internship acceptances, don’t give up! It can be rough watching your inbox fill up with rejections...
Inspiration for self-promotion. My thoughts after reading Show Your Work!

If you’re an incoming #computerscience first year and you’re looking for a leg up the McMaster Computer Science Society is hosting a #Haskell primer next Tuesday at 8pm on the CS discord: https://lnkd.in/eAzeb8g
